Movie about two Australian girls--Debbie (Nell Schofield) and Sue (Sue Knight)--and what happens when they become girlfriends of two surrogates from Broken Hill in New South Wales.
Three couples in relationships of different kinds end up stranded in the South Australian outback after a call out for dinner for a rural romance author the men had been discussing.
A surrealist love story between three childhood friends. Simple but sensitive, with splashes of blood.<|end_of_text|>

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owner moves away, has gone feral and taken to stalking the neighborhood, murdering one and scaring others. A teenaged girl, Liza, has a special connection with the cat, whom she names "Christine".
